Test Name: Epstein-Barr Virus (EBV) Latency Membrane Protein 1 (LMP1) Immunostain, Technical Component Only
Purpose: To detect EBV Latency Membrane Protein 1 expression in tissue samples, ensuring accurate and reproducible immunohistochemical staining for diagnostic evaluation.
Container: Positively charged or silanized microscope slide
Equipment: Automated immunostainer (e.g., Ventana Benchmark or Dako Autostainer)
